content:
You are a friendly AI, helping me with 
general tasks.
Hello Jack, this is Bing. Nice to meet you. 😊
tell me who is president of the united states?

[1]: https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_of_the_United_States "President of the United States - Simple English Wikipedia, the free ..."
[2]: https://www.history.com/topics/us-presidents/joe-biden "Joe Biden: Age, Presidency, Family - HISTORY"
[3]: https://www.whitehouse.gov/about-the-white-house/presidents/barack-obama/ "Barack Obama | The White House"
[4]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Presidents_of_the_United_States "List of presidents of the United States - Wikipedia"
[5]: https://www.whitehouse.gov/about-the-white-house/presidents/ "Presidents | The White House"
[6]: https://www.britannica.com/topic/Presidents-of-the-United-States-1846696 "list of presidents of the United States - Encyclopedia Britannica"

The current president of the United States is **Joe Biden**, who took office in January 2021[^1^][1] [^2^][2]. He is the 46th president of the United States[^3^][4] [^4^][5]. Do you want to know more about him or any other president?
You told me your name is Jack. Is that correct?
